name: Roadwork Ahead
description: Warns of roadworks ahead.

name: Workers Ahead
description: Alerts drivers that workers are present on or near the road.

name: Cyclists Dismount
description: Cyclists must dismount and walk their bikes through the area.

name: Traffic Hazard
description: Warns of potential traffic hazards ahead.

name: Traffic Controller
description: Indicates presence of a traffic controller ahead.

name: Traffic Controller (Symbolic)
description: Symbolic representation of a traffic controller.

name: End Roadwork
description: Indicates the end of the roadworks zone.

name: Detour Ahead
description: Indicates a detour ahead on the route.

name: Detour (Arrow)
description: Detour direction indicated with an arrow.

name: End Detour
description: Indicates the end of a detour route.

name: Cyclists Dismount
description: Instructs cyclists to dismount and walk their bikes.

name: Pedestrians Watch Your Step
description: Warns pedestrians of uneven surfaces or trip hazards.

name: Footpath Closed
description: Indicates the footpath is closed; use alternative path.

name: Pedestrian Arrow
description: Directs pedestrians to the left or right (arrow version).

name: Use Other Footpath
description: Instructs pedestrians to use the opposite footpath.

name: Roadwork Ahead (Multi-Message)
description: Multi-panel sign showing Roadwork Ahead.

name: End Roadwork (Multi-Message)
description: Multi-panel sign showing End Roadwork.

name: Traffic Controller Ahead / Prepare to Stop
description: Combined message for traffic controller and stop prep.

name: Lane Status (e.g. LANE CLOSED)
description: Displays lane status like closure or merging.

name: ROAD CLOSED AHEAD / DETOUR AHEAD
description: Warns of road closure and alternate detour route.

name: 25 km/h Speed Limit
description: Temporary speed limit of 25 kilometers per hour.

name: 40 km/h Speed Limit
description: Temporary speed limit of 40 kilometers per hour.

name: 60 km/h Speed Limit
description: Temporary speed limit of 60 kilometers per hour.

name: 80 km/h Speed Limit
description: Temporary speed limit of 80 kilometers per hour.

name: Lane Closed
description: Indicates a lane closure ahead.

name: Left Lane Closed
description: Specifies the left lane is closed.

name: Right Lane Closed
description: Specifies the right lane is closed.

name: Centre Lane Closed
description: Indicates the centre lane is closed ahead.

name: Dynamic Lane Status
description: Electronic sign for updating lane status dynamically.

name: Prepare to Stop - General
description: Advance warning to prepare to stop.

name: Advance Warning - Prepare to Stop
description: Advance warning sign for upcoming stop requirement.

name: Prepare to Stop on Red Signal
description: Indicates drivers must be prepared to stop if red light is shown.

name: Temporary Traffic Signals
description: Warns of temporary traffic signals ahead.

name: Traffic Controller Ahead
description: Warning that a traffic controller is ahead.

name: Temporary Speed Limit - 25 km/h
description: Advisory temporary speed limit of 25 km/h.

name: Temporary Speed Limit - 40 km/h
description: Advisory temporary speed limit of 40 km/h.

name: Temporary Speed Limit - 50 km/h
description: Advisory temporary speed limit of 50 km/h.

name: Temporary Speed Limit - 60 km/h
description: Advisory temporary speed limit of 60 km/h.

name: Temporary Speed Limit - 80 km/h
description: Advisory temporary speed limit of 80 km/h.

name: Temporary Speed Limit - 100 km/h
description: Advisory temporary speed limit of 100 km/h.

name: End Road Work
description: Indicates the end of a roadwork zone.

name: End Detour
description: Marks the end of a detour route.

name: Traffic Controller (Symbolic)
description: Symbolic representation of a traffic controller ahead.

name: Prepare to Stop
description: Warns drivers to prepare to stop for traffic changes.

name: Workers (Symbolic)
description: Symbolic sign indicating presence of road workers.

name: Roadwork Ahead
description: Warns drivers of roadwork ahead.

name: Roadwork Speed Limit (Symbolic)
description: Symbolic advisory of speed limit in roadwork zone.

name: Detour (Symbolic)
description: Symbolic indication of a detour route.

name: Detour Ahead
description: Informs drivers that a detour is ahead.

name: Detour Ends
description: Indicates the end of a detour route.

name: Advance Warning
description: Gives advance notice of upcoming road conditions or changes.

name: Lane Status (Symbolic)
description: Displays the operational status of traffic lanes.

name: Lane Closed (Symbolic)
description: Symbolic notice that a specific traffic lane is closed.

name: Shoulder Closed (Symbolic)
description: Indicates that the shoulder is closed to traffic.

name: Prepare to Stop (Symbolic)
description: Symbolic sign warning drivers to prepare to stop.

name: Traffic Controller (Symbolic)
description: Symbolic icon indicating a traffic controller is operating ahead.

name: Slow (Symbolic)
description: Symbolic sign directing vehicles to slow down.

name: Stop (Symbolic)
description: Symbolic stop instruction for vehicles at traffic-controlled worksites.

name: Roadwork Ahead (Multi-message)
description: Indicates that roadwork is ahead using a multi-message format.

name: End Roadwork (Multi-message)
description: Indicates the end of a roadwork zone using a multi-message format.

name: Traffic Controller Ahead / Prepare to Stop
description: Multi-message board warning of traffic controller and upcoming stop requirement.

name: Lane Status Signs (e.g., LANE CLOSED, FORM 1 LANE)
description: Multi-message board displaying lane usage information or closures.

name: Road Closed Ahead, Local Traffic Only, Detour Ahead
description: Multi-message board used to redirect traffic and inform about road closures.

name: Speed Limit 25 km/h
description: Temporary regulatory sign indicating a 25 km/h speed limit.

name: Speed Limit 40 km/h
description: Temporary regulatory sign indicating a 40 km/h speed limit.

name: Speed Limit 60 km/h
description: Temporary regulatory sign indicating a 60 km/h speed limit.

name: Speed Limit 80 km/h
description: Temporary regulatory sign indicating an 80 km/h speed limit.
